title: New: GRRL PAL – NGHT
body:
Australian duo **GRRL PAL’s** new single, _NGHT_, sounds scarily like Purity Ring at times, perhaps intentionally so.

That said, I’m a sucker for this sound, so I’m not complaining. Their third original track, recorded after spending some time in the US, it’s hopefully a indication of much more to come from Jay Lekat and Danny K in 2015. Check it out below, alongside previous track, Paradise.
